ROOT.GetStationInfoByRange: SELECT distinct gid from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG stationpoint {0}
ROOT.DelStationByID: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG stationpoint_split where gid ='{0}' and linevoltagetype='{1}'
ROOT.DelStationBatch: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG stationpoint_split s using (values {0}) as tmp(id,linevoltype) where s.linevoltagetype=tmp.linevoltype and s.gid=tmp.id ;
ROOT.GetDirectLineInfoByRange: select distinct gid from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_direct_info {0}
ROOT.DelDirectLineByID: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_direct_info where gid ='{0}'
ROOT.DelDirectLineBatch: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_direct_info using (values {0}) as tmp(id) where same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_direct_info.gid=tmp.id;
ROOT.GetLineInfoByRange: select distinct gid from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_info {0}
ROOT.DelLineByID: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_info where gid ='{0}'
ROOT.DelLineBatch: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_info_split using (values {0}) as tmp(id) where same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_info_split.gid=tmp.id;
ROOT.DelPolyLineByID: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_poly_info where gid ='{0}'
ROOT.DelPolyLineBatch: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_poly_info using (values {0}) as tmp(id) where same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_poly_info.gid=tmp.id;
ROOT.GetPolyLineInfoByRange: select distinct gid from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_poly_info {0}
ROOT.DelTowerByID: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG towerpoint_test where gid ='{0}'and lineid = '{1}'
ROOT.DelTowerBatch: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG towerpoint_test s using (values {0}) as tmp(id,lineid) where s.lineid=tmp.lineid and s.gid=tmp.id ;
ROOT.InserIntoTowerPointByTable: TRUNCATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG towerpoint; INSERT into same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG towerpoint SELECT * from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG towerpoint_test; TRUNCATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG towerpoint_test;
ROOT.GetLineCrossLinePoint_old: select ST_AsText(ST_Intersection(geom,ST_SetSRID( ST_LineFromText('LINESTRING({0})'),3857) )),gid from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_info_split where gid in ({1})
ROOT.GetLineCrossLinePoint: select st_astext(ST_Transform(ST_Intersection(ST_Transform(geom,26986),ST_Transform(ST_SetSRID( ST_LineFromText('LINESTRING({0})'),3857),26986) ),3857)),gid,voltagetype from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG acline_dcline_info_split where gid in ({1})
ROOT.GetDistricProvice: SELECT st_astext(st_transform(st_Multi(ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(st_transform(geom, 3857), 200)),4326)),name,admincode,parentcode FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG provice_region WHERE admincode ='{0}'
ROOT.GetDistricXian: SELECT st_astext(st_transform(st_Multi(ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(st_transform(geom, 3857), 50)),4326)),name,admincode,parentcode FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG citybrige WHERE admincode='{0}'
ROOT.GetDistricSubXian: SELECT st_astext(st_transform(st_Multi(ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(st_transform(geom, 3857), 0)),4326)),name,admincode,parentcode FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG xianbrige WHERE admincode='{0}'
ROOT.GetDistricProviceChild: SELECT st_astext(st_transform(st_Multi(ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(st_transform(geom, 3857), 200)),4326)),name,admincode,parentcode FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG provice_region WHERE parentcode='{0}'
ROOT.GetDistricXianChild: SELECT st_astext(st_transform(st_Multi(ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(st_transform(geom, 3857), 100)),4326)),name,admincode,parentcode FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG citybrige WHERE parentcode='{0}'
ROOT.GetDistricSubXianChild: SELECT st_astext(st_transform(st_Multi(ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(st_transform(geom, 3857), 0)),4326)),name,admincode,parentcode FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG xianbrige WHERE parentcode='{0}'
ROOT.GetDistricChina: SELECT st_astext(st_transform(st_Multi(ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(st_transform(geom, 3857), 2000)),4326)),name,admincode,parentcode FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG provice_region where parentcode not in ('990100')
ROOT.GetCityRegions: SELECT st_astext(st_transform(st_Multi(ST_SimplifyPreserveTopology(st_transform(geom, 3857), 100)),4326)),name,admincode,parentcode FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG citybrige WHERE admincode in ({0})
ROOT.GetCityBrige: SELECT admincode from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG provice_region where {0} UNION All SELECT admincode from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG citybrige where {1} UNION All SELECT admincode from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG xianbrige where {2}
ROOT.GetCorrectionStationByChina: SELECT DISTINCT a.gid, 1 as type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG provice_region b, same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG stationpoint a where b.admincode='100000' and a.gid = '{0}' and ST_Contains(st_setsrid(b.geom,3857), a.geom)='f'
ROOT.GetCorrectionStationByPwID: SELECT DISTINCT a.gid, 2 as type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG stationpoint a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG {2} b on a.pg_id = concat('0101',b.admincode) left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG {3} c on b.parentcode=c.admincode where a.gid = '{0}' and b.admincode = '{1}' and ST_Contains(st_setsrid(b.geom,3857), a.geom)='f'
ROOT.GetCorrectionStationByVol_China: SELECT DISTINCT a.gid, 1 as type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG provice_region b, same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG stationpoint a where b.admincode='100000' and a.voltagetype = {0} and ST_Contains(st_setsrid(b.geom,3857), a.geom)='f'
ROOT.GetCorrectionStationByVol: SELECT DISTINCT a.gid, 2 as type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG stationpoint a left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG {1} b on a.pg_id = concat('0101',b.admincode) left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaPG {2} c on b.parentcode=c.admincode where a.voltagetype = {0} and ST_Contains(st_setsrid(b.geom,3857), a.geom)='f' and ST_Contains(st_setsrid(c.geom,3857), a.geom)='f'
